# Mac Keyboard Layout - Eesperanto

A set of super convenient keyboard layout schemata for the Esperanto language.

![Flag of Esperanto](assets/Flag_of_Esperanto.png)

## Homepage

<https://github.com/jakwings/mac-keyboard-Esperanto>

## Installation

Just drop Esperanto.bundle in the directory `~/Library/Keyboard Layouts`

`~` is your home directory. (e.g. `/Users/ada`)

Then in the system preferences add this layout from the English section.

## Features

*   Based on multiplue layouts of the English Apple keyboards.

*   More latin letters from the combinations of accents and letters.

*   Support x-system:

    *   `c` + `x`/`X` = ĉ, `C` + `x`/`X` = Ĉ
    *   `g` + `x`/`X` = ĝ, `G` + `x`/`X` = Ĝ
    *   `s` + `x`/`X` = ŝ, `S` + `x`/`X` = Ŝ
    *   `u` + `x`/`X` = ŭ, `U` + `x`/`X` = Ŭ

*   Support h-system:

    *   `c` + `h`/`H` = ĉ, `C` + `h`/`H` = Ĉ
    *   `g` + `h`/`H` = ĝ, `G` + `h`/`H` = Ĝ
    *   `s` + `h`/`H` = ŝ, `S` + `h`/`H` = Ŝ
    *   `u` + `h`/`H` = ŭ, `U` + `h`/`H` = Ŭ

*   Use ESC or Tab or irrelevant keys to cancel any incomplete combination:

    *   `c` + `Tab` = `c`, `C` + `Tab` = C
    *   `g` + `Tab` = `g`, `C` + `Tab` = G
    *   `s` + `Tab` = `s`, `C` + `Tab` = S
    *   `u` + `Tab` = `u`, `U` + `Tab` = U
    *   `S` + `u` + `g` + `a` + `r` + `c` + `o` + `a` + `t` + `i` + `n` + `g` + `.` = Sugarcoating.
